articles.author: Brittney Melton
articles.title: Trump to address the affordability issue. And, Border Patrol heading to Charlotte - NPR
articles.description: Americans are feeling the strain of high prices, and now President Trump is preparing to take on the concern. And, Charlotte, N.C., is bracing for Border Patrol agents to arrive in the city.
